storage_invariants.description: Vault share price must not change more than 5% per transaction
storage_invariants.reason: Vault pattern detected. Share price manipulation indicates attack.
storage_invariants.violation_impact: Allows attacker to mint underpriced shares and drain underlying assets

storage_invariants.description: Total supply must be backed by proportional underlying reserves
storage_invariants.reason: Vault shares should not exceed underlying assets by more than 10%
storage_invariants.violation_impact: Indicates phantom shares minted without backing

metadata.description: Total shares should not exceed underlying assets
metadata.note: This is an absolute constraint, not dynamically adjusted

storage_invariants.description: totalSupply should not change more than 50% in single transaction
storage_invariants.reason: Large totalSupply changes indicate potential manipulation
storage_invariants.violation_impact: Flash mint attacks, accounting manipulation, or reentrancy
